certificate.description: certificate in the body of a message

methodRequestAndResponse.description: parameters and response for a sync method call

requestPayload.description: payload for the request that arrived from the service.  Used to verify that the correct request arrived.

responsePayload.description: payload for the response to return to the service.  Used to verify that the correct request arrived.

statusCode.description: status code to return to the service

connectResponse.description: result of a connection to a service, device, or module client

methodInvoke.description: parameters used to invoke a method

payload.description: payload to send to the method

responseTimeoutInSeconds.description: number of seconds to wait for a response

connectTimeoutInSeconds.description: number of seconds to wait for the module to connect

eventBody.description: body for an invoming or outgoing event or message

body.description: payload to send to the method

logMessage.description: message from the test script to output to the log

containerName.description: name of container in the azure storage host to upload into

correlationId.description: correlation id to use for upload

sasToken.description: sas token to use to authenticate with azure storage host
